dmca.title: [EV1-C1867962F] FWD: website needs to be taken down

---------- Original Message ----------------------------------
From: "Katie Gardner" <kgardner@amor.org>
Date: Fri, 17 Nov 2006 15:33:42 -0800 
 
Hi, I am writing about a website that is being hosted by you guys: 
http://art315.dodeci.com/abewsey/amor_site/ 
  
It is not our company site, but still claims to have our copyright, so
therefore needs to be taken down. I contacted Dodeci about taking
offline, but have gotten no response. I am wondering if you can help me
since it is hosted by you guys. Any info. would help. 
  
Thanks for your time,
Katie Gardner 
  
katieGARDNER
AMORministries
619.662.1200 ext.122
amor dot org <http://www.amor.org/>
